title: I Remember You
overview: Two's company but three's a crowd when the line between love and friendship is blurredâ€¦I Remember You revolves around three friends who have graduated from the same high school. Despite coming from different family backgrounds and having dissimilar personalities, the three of them are able to remain good friends. As they make their way into society as new graduates and face new challenges in life, will their friendship be able to stand up to the test?
